name: Hewlicase
description:
Post-Jam Update 07DEC2022  --------------------

- Changed the look to make the strands more DNA-like, and not little ladders.

- Increased the size of the hit boxes, and enlarged the strands slightly.

Controls ------------------------

Aim for the green proteins with your mouse, and click with the left button!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Good DNA needs to replicate, and you must help by splitting the strands! Target the green protein blocks, but be wary of bad DNA floating about. You'll be allowed only 3 mistakes!

Made for Trijam 197, with the theme of SPLIT UP! Feedback always appreciated, and thanks for playing!
